posts.postText: Would it be possible to link the Shop to all of our servers, so you have the same amount of points on every server?

I think somebody else suggested it, I think it would be a good idea.
It would promote people swapping servers to get points, like 20 points an half hour in jail instead of just 10 on ttt.

But the hats and masks would have to be linked too, which some people might not want.

I have the spotlight head and the flashy trail on jail, but I don't use anything on TTT and I don't want to >.>

I have seen that done on noxousnet.


Its a good idea, but its going to be a bitch to implement.

All the gamemodes that do have the shop have different ways of getting points, and different rates. Someone could spend 3 hours on puzzle, get 1000 points, then use them all of stuff on TTT which SHOULD BE harder to get than just that. 

Different servers, different perks, different prices. No.
